text: Zhang Xianliang (; December 1936 â€“ 27 September 2014) was a Chinese author and poet. He was the former president of the China Writer Association in Ningxia. He was a political prisoner during the Anti-Rightist Movement in 1957,John Litweiler, 'Chairman Mao's Insidious Legacy" , Chicago Tribune, 24 September, 1995. until 1979. His most well known works, include Half of Man is Woman and Grass Soup.
